members.name: Ryan Petschek
members.bio: As a junior, Ryan is the lead programmer on the GFA Robotics team. This is his third year with the Dragonoids. He plays tennis and baseball and also fences and skis.

members.name: Tyler Green
members.bio: A sophomore, Tyler has been with the GFA Robotics team for two years now. Outside of the robotics team, he is on the varsity sailing and cross country teams and plays in the GFA Band. In his free time, Tyler sleeps.

members.name: Pete Fisher
members.bio: Pete is in his third year with the team and is currently a sophomore.

members.name: Scott Barnet
members.bio: Brother of the club's founder, Van Barnet, Scott is in his third year with the team as a sophomore.

members.name: Kyle DiTieri
members.bio: Kyle DiTieri is the robotics team's primary coach. He also teaches physics and coaches fencing at Greens Farms Academy.

members.name: Jesse Robinson
members.bio: Jesse Robinson is the Director of IT at Greens Farms Academy.
